column3: Traffic Alert for E Vine St at Beck Aly:
column4: The center lane is blocked in front of the Lextran Transit Center due to a water  main break.

column3: Traffic Alert for E Vine St at Beck Aly:
column4: Motorists can expect delays thru rush hour.  Use added caution if traveling in this area.

column5: All inbound lanes are shutdown, and the outbound side is down to one lane.
